version_string: Version 1.002;PS 001.002;hotconv 1.0.70;makeotf.lib2.5.58329 DEVELOPMENT; ttfautohint (v1.00) -l 8 -r 50 -G 200 -x 14 -D latn -f none -w G
description: Sura is a Devanagari typeface family designed by Carolina Giovagnoli. It is based on the original Latin typeface Andada, a serif typeface for text. Andada is a text font with an organic-slab serif, hybrid style, a solid design of medium stroke contrast. This font has received an award at the 2010 Ibero-America Design Biennial. The Biennial was shown in Spain, Argentina, Chile, El Salvador, Uruguay, Bolivia, Colombia and Venezuela. The Sura project is led by Carolina Giovagnoli, a type designer based in Argentina. To contribute, see github.com/CaroGiovagnoli/sura
